Key Arguments: The legislation threatens freedom of speech and democratic rights.
The government would have the authority to define truth, leading to potential manipulation of information.
The bill creates a double standard by imposing restrictions on online platforms while giving mainstream media a free pass.
The subjective definition of misinformation and disinformation could lead to abuse of power.
The bill could lead to ideological conformity and suppress dissenting voices.
Notable Quotes: The ultimate truth does not rest with the government but is found in our Lord Jesus Christ.
No Government should be the authority of truth.
No Government should limit freedom of speech.
